branchCategory.name: KC

branchItem.name: KC, Tube Coupler, Self Seal Fittings
branchItem.description: <p>Self-seal fitting series KC is best for multiple use areas when pressure cannot be shut down. One- touch fittings (with built-in self-seal mechanism) are used to prevent air exhaust when removing tube. There are 10 styles available including electroless nickel plated for copper-free applications.</p>
